mapper.select: SELECT m.id menuId, #{userId} userId, m.title1 + ' - ' + m.title2 title, CASE WHEN userId IS NOT NULL THEN 1 ELSE 0 END enabled FROM menu m LEFT JOIN menuUser u ON m.id = u.menuId AND userId = #{userId} ORDER BY m.no
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM menuUser WHERE menuId = #{menuId} AND userId = #{userId}
